titleStmt.title: News from Doctor's commons, or, A true narrative of Mr. Hickeringill's appearance there, June 8, 1681 upon a citation for marrying people without bannes or license, with a protestation against their spiritual court : to which is added, An essay concerning the virtue of sequestrations.

News from Doctor's commons, or, A true narrative of Mr. Hickeringill's appearance there, June 8, 1681 upon a citation for marrying people without bannes or license, with a protestation against their spiritual court : to which is added, An essay concerning the virtue of sequestrations.
titleStmt.author: Hickeringill, Edmund, 1631-1708. Essay concerning sequestrations.

notesStmt.note: This work appears as follows: reel 567:3 as Wing H1823 (number cancelled); reel 669:6b as Wing N954 (bound with: Wing H1797, does not appear in reel guide); reel 1153:17 as Wing N954.
